00001 //Scott Rippee
00002 //Program #4
00003 //CSci 151
00004 //06.08.03
00005 //This program uses given functions to run
00006 //benchmarks on given graphs
00007 
00008 #include "readgraph.h"
00009 #include <queue>
00010 
00011 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00012 {
00013         queue<string> graphFN_queue;
00014         ReadGraph g;
00015         string curFN;
00016 
00017         if( argc == 1 )
00018         {
00019                 g.printHelp();
00020                 exit(1);
00021         }
00022 
00023         for( int x=1; x<argc; x++ )
00024         {
00025                 graphFN_queue.push( argv[x] );
00026         }       
00027 
00028         while( !graphFN_queue.empty() )
00029         {
00030                 curFN = graphFN_queue.front();
00031                 graphFN_queue.pop();
00032 
00033                 //open graph file then parse it
00034                 if( g.openGraph( curFN ) ) {
00035                         cout<< endl<< "Graph File Name: "<< curFN<< endl;
00036                         g.parseGraph();
00037                 }
00038         }
00039         cout<<endl;
00040         return 0;
00041 }
